name: Flying School Bus Simulator - Extreme Stunt Bus Airplane Flight Pilot
name_original: Flying School Bus Simulator - Extreme Stunt Bus Airplane Flight Pilot
description:
Ever heard about flying buses? Flying school buses to pick and drop the passengers in real time? Yes that’s the future. The most realistic flying bus simulator is here! It’s all about to the newest and most realistic flying school bus game ever found on the play store! Your task is to bring passengers safely from one point to another. If you like aeroplane and flying bus games then this will be the best experience for you.

In this city driver simulator game you are playing the role of real life bus driver and also you have to follow the traffic rules and drive with care. And the best thing is that we have built the smart 3D traffic system for users which is new to any flying bus simulator 2016 game. You have never ever seen a 3D flying bus simulator 2016 which has a 3D city driving experience as in City driver simulator game. This 3D designed flying bus parking game truly looks like you are driving in real life. This is something you can feel from the driver's seat of your bus.
